name: Blackcliff Slasher
desc: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a dark crimson color from the blade to the pommel.
skill_desc: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
